Package src

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
src.GameBoard
public class GameBoard extends Object
Stores the main game board composed of Tile objects and controls movement of pieces within the board.

Handles initialization of gameplay features; Player initialization, animal move controls, and win conditions.

    • checkGameState

      public boolean checkGameState()
      Checks if game is still running (No win condition is met)
      Returns:
      false if win condition is met, true if game is still running

    • getPlayer

      Parameters:
      i - - index of specific player to access
      Returns:

    • getFirstPlayer

      public int getFirstPlayer()
      Gets the index of the first player to move.
      Returns:
      1 or 0, based on result of initPlayerColors

    • selectAnimal

      public Animal selectAnimal​(int nPlayer, Scanner kbIn)
      Selects the animal to use.
      Parameters:
      nPlayer - - index of player to get piece from
      kbIn - - keyboard input scanner
      Returns:
      animal object to use

    • moveAnimal

      public boolean moveAnimal​(Animal currAnimal, Position nextPos)
      sets new position of animal if new position is valid. If there is an opposing animal in the new position, checks if the animal can be captured. Otherwise, retain position.
      Parameters:
      currAnimal - - current animal to move
      nextPos - - position to check
      Returns:
      true if successful, false if unsuccessful

    • captureAnimal

      public boolean captureAnimal​(Animal currAnimal, Animal otherAnimal)
      Checks if currAnimal can capture otherAnimal if not null.
      Parameters:
      currAnimal - - current animal that will capture
      otherAnimal - - other animal to be captured
      Returns:
      true if captured/empty, false if not

    • searchTile

      public Tile searchTile​(Position pos)
      Searches for tile with matching position if position is valid.
      Parameters:
      pos - - position of tile to search
      Returns:
      reference to specific tile if found, null if not found

    • isValidPosition

      public boolean isValidPosition​(Animal currAnimal, Position pos)
      Checks if pos is valid tile for currAnimal to move to.
      Parameters:
      currAnimal - - current animal to check
      pos - - next position to check for validity
      Returns:
      true if position is valid, false if not

    • jumpRiver

      public Position jumpRiver​(Position currPos, Position nextPos)
      performs jumping over a river, returning the new position to move to.
      Parameters:
      currPos - - current animal's position
      nextPos - - next positon to move to
      Returns:
      new position across the river tiles, next tile directly if not a river

    • checkTrap

      public Tile checkTrap()
      checks traps if there is an opponent animal close to a den.
      Returns:
      Tile of animal that triggered check

    • checkWinningMove

      public void checkWinningMove​(int nPlayer)
      Checks for winning moves/conditions.
      Parameters:
      nPlayer - - Player to check for available pieces.
